/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades adorned with red lanterns that add a vibrant splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles, common modes of transportation in the city, are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city dwellers going about their day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
